talents.name: HarbingerOfEvil
talents.label: Harbinger of Evil
talents.description: Cultists receive souls when merging or making a sacrifice. Each soul increases Cultist damage by 2%. When the number of souls reaches 20, a Cultist in demon form transforms into a Harbinger, which increases their attack speed by 15%.

talents.name: HarbingerOfTheAbyss
talents.label: Harbinger of the Abyss
talents.description: Cultists in demon form receive souls when merging or making a sacrifice. For every 6 souls, a guardian demon is summoned. Upon death, the demon sets fire to a random unit, reducing its rank. Summoning 4 guardians transforms a demonic Cultist into a Harbinger, which receives a soul every 20 s. In Co-Op mode and in the Plunder Chalenge, guardians grant mana.

talents.name: GreatRitual
talents.label: Great Ritual
talents.description: When a Sacrifice is activated, it destroys both Cultist and other units on the field corners. The other units don't grant mana, but they have a 40% chance of granting a soul.

talents.name: CleansingSacrifice
talents.label: Cleansing Sacrifice
talents.description: When a Sacrifice is activated, every Cultist destroyed will remove the negative effect from 1 random Cultists and will increase its damage by 10% for 10s.

talents.name: UnityOfTheCult
talents.label: Unity of the Cult
talents.description: A Cultist in Harbinger form increases its damage by 5% for every Cultist on the field, including Harbingers.

talents.name: Monsters of the Abyss
talents.label: MonstersOfTheAbyss
talents.description: When killing monsters, one Cultist in the Harbinger form will have a 15% chance of summoning fast demons onto the enemy's path. When a mini boss or a demon guardian appears on the enemy's path, the Cultist in the from of a Harbinger will increase its damage by 25% for 15 seconds. Doesn't work in Co-Op mode or in the Plunder Challlenge.

talents.name: FlameOfTheAbyss
talents.label: Flame of the Abyss
talents.description: When attacking, Harbinger creates a pulse of fire that lasts 2s. The pulse deals 100% of the Cultist's damage value every 0.2s and reduces monster armor in its radius by 40%. There can only be one pulse on the field at a time.
